document_data.name: Dweomer pantograph
document_data.mainbody: A '''dweomer pantograph''' was a [[wand]] that replicated [[spell]]s cast upon it.
document_data.Description: It could be mistaken for a wand.
document_data.Powers: It duplicated on command magical effects that struck it.
document_data.History: One user, [[Quaervaxthanus]], had mages cast spells on the ''pantograph'' to expand his own capabilities.
